text: George Lewis (1875–unknown) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Bristol City, Leicester Fosse, Notts County and Walsall. ==References== Category:1875 births Category:date of death unknown Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:English Football League players Category:Walsall F.C. players Category:Wellingborough Town F.C. players Category:Notts County F.C. players Category:Bristol City F.C. players Category:Stourbridge F.C. players Category:Leicester City F.C. players
title: George Lewis (footballer, born 1875)
